tool_input.description: Rename tailwind config to .mjs to fix module type warning

tool_response.originalFile:
{
  "compilerOptions": {
    "lib": ["dom", "dom.iterable", "esnext"],
    "allowJs": true,
    "skipLibCheck": true,
    "strict": true,
    "forceConsistentCasingInFileNames": true,
    "noEmit": true,
    "esModuleInterop": true,
    "module": "esnext",
    "moduleResolution": "bundler",
    "resolveJsonModule": true,
    "isolatedModules": true,
    "jsx": "preserve",
    "incremental": true,
    "plugins": [
      {
        "name": "next"
      }
    ],
    "paths": {
      "@/*": ["./*"]
    },
    "target": "ES2017"
  },
  "include": [
    "next-env.d.ts",
    "**/*.ts",
    "**/*.tsx",
    ".next/types/**/*.ts",
    "tailwind.config.js"
  ],
  "exclude": [
    "node_modules",
    "check-sentry-*.ts",
    "test-sentry-*.ts",
    "scripts/**/*",
    "lib/persistence/examples/**/*"
  ]
}
